title: Metamorphosis: The Ballad of Darane: Book 2
description: Nations prepare for war with an invisible enemy and old feuds are reignited. The teachings of Aerokin talk of evil which will infect and consume everything it touches - and of a woman with the power to save or condemn all.The Ballad of Darane chronicles the journey of a woman with a destiny and power she does not understand or want, as she struggles to cope with the brutality of the world she inhabits.Metamorphosis is the second book in the Ballad of Darane series.
author: Tir Cey
